name: Melanie Williams
text: I had a positive experience prior so hired Kevin again. I tried to reach him to make things right and could not reach him via phone or text. My flooring was cut incorrectly. I have numerous spots where you can see the slab. Toilets were not correctly re-installed. House was left a total mess. Floors were filthy, grout and sand and debris left in my sinks and tubs. Trim was not replaced where it belonged. Hole was made in my bedroom wall, was repaired, not great. I felt I was taken advantage of regarding charges to remove subfloor. I questioned the high rate and was told it was because it could take days, it took hours yet I wasn’t offered any relief.

name: Alex
text: Kevin is prompt and very professional. He arrived on time and notified me in advance when he would be here and what he would be doing. He tore out my old plastic master shower and tiled in a beautiful new one for me. The only negative is my water bill is going to go up because I love my shower now.10/10 highly recommended for tile in shower work.

name: Meredith Zywno
text: Kevin and his team recently replaced some laminate flooring in two rooms of our house with hardwoods. Kevin arrived on time and got the job done well within the expected timeline. He and his team were extremely courteous and professional, and his office manager was very easy to work with. We are very happy with how our floors turned out and will definitely be calling WCR in the future.

resp.text: Meredith, thank you so much for your positive review!

name: Dra Coleman
text: The quality of work is very poor.  The quality of work could have been mitigated if problems  we're shared with the owner when discovered.  You  can not suggest or make comments unless you pay for his and son mistakes.  This guy does not listen and have an answer for everything.  I would not recommend this company to anyone else.  I am having to hire someone else to correct his errors with the wood floors installed.

name: Larry Levitt
text: Kevin and his crew work hard to provide quality service in a polite, professional manner. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Larry, thank you for your kind words! It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Caryn B
text: Kevin and his crew did an excellent job remodeling our bathtub into a walk in shower. He was kind enough, and patient enough, to work around our crazy hours and scheduling to get the job done. Only one little hiccup with the plumbing but he just called in another plumber and was back on track in no time! Job well done gentlemen!

resp.text: Thank you Caryn for your kind words! It makes us happy that you are pleased with our work.

name: Ivy Heffelfinger
text: Kevin made the entire process of a tile backsplash seamless. The job was on time, didn’t overspend on material and it was done beautifully. Will definitely keep them in mind for our next project

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Jennifer Greer
text: They redid our master bathroom shower and did such a beautiful job! Kevin was so great to work with and we could not be happier with the outcome!

resp.text: Thank you Jennifer!

name: Buddy Boggs
text:
Kevin came to my home in Meridianville as scheduled. He tore out the old tile and sub floor and then put down backer board and new tile. I found Kevin to be very professional, knowledgeable and friendly. All trash was removed and I am well pleased with the work.
William Boggs

resp.text: Buddy we appreciate the opportunity, glad you were pleased with the services provided.

name: Melissa Lloyd
text: KEVIN AND HIS CREW DID A FABULOUS JOB REPLACING MY WOOD FLOOR WITH PORCELIN WOOD TILE.

resp.text: Melissa it was a pleasure working with you, thank you for entrusting us with your project.

name: John Whitman
text: Outstanding work by Kevin and his team: prompt, fast but high quality, informative. Would hire them again.

resp.text: John, thank you for the opportunity and we look forward to working with you again.

name: Fred T
text: Beutiful work and on schedule.

resp.text: Fredrick thank you.

name: Bahia Saxon
text: this was a top notch experience. I was so impressed about how easy and seamless this process was. Not only are the professionals at Homewood Carpet & Flooring super helpful and friendly but the final installation was pristine. We couldn't be happier with our result and they were very cost efficient. I will absolutely be using these guys for any flooring project in the future. If I could give more than five stars I would! :-)

name: Susan Upton
text: Had an incredible experience using this company. They got everything in when they said they would and were very easy to communicate with. Finished look was 10x better than I imagined! Highly recommend

name: Sarah Donnell
text: Paul was great to work with! Really knows his stuff. The instal only took a little over an hour and they were super friendly and efficient! We are so happy with our new carpet. Highly recommend!

name: Mary Dutta
text: Ww had an excellent experience with this company. Paul was very responsive and clear up front about the process. Buck and his crew were prompt, pleasant, and did a beautiful job. The price was reasonable and the results outstanding. Highly recommend.

name: Lora Gaxiola
text: Paul was responsive and easy to work with. He presented several options to fit our budget. The work was done promptly, neatly, and efficiently and we're so happy with the results!

name: Sarah LeCroy
text: So happy with my floors. I chose to go with a darker grey flooring that is scratch proof and waterproof. I have a black lab, so these floors will be so much better than the dingy carpet I had. Paul was very prompt and even came to my condo to show me samples. I never even had to go in the store, everyone came to me! I called Homewood carpet and flooring, and the same afternoon I ordered my floors. Buk and his helpers were on time and did a fantastic job. They cleaned up very well after laying the floors and were respectful of my furniture and belongings. I live in a 750~ sq ft. Condo, approximately 3/4 of the condo flooring was being redone, and took 10 hours from start to finish. I would highly recommend Homewood Carpet and Flooring. You can’t beat the quality of floors, the timeliness and the accountability they give you for their price. Thank you!

name: Elizabeth Adams
text: Very responsive and helpful! Helped us out in a pinch when our first carpet installer backed out just a few weeks before the project date. Directed me to a carpet that was in stock (and what I wanted) so that the project could move forward on the timeline our business needed. At the install, they discovered an unexpected floor issue which required us to make a last minute change and he handled that and found an available carpet for us. Went above and beyond to make sure our timeline was met! Super nice guys did the install. Great attitudes and a pleasure to work with.

name: Naomi Smitherman
text:
I was pleased with the whole process.  I needed carpet stretched.  I got a fair quote for the work and it was completed sooner than expected.
The two men who stretched the carpet were prompt, courteous, quick workers and they did a great job.  My floors look so much better.

name: Melanie Clark
text: Foo did an amazing job with helping me pick out quality flooring for two basement rooms. He gave a great price and was quick with getting me scheduled. The communication was great through the whole process. He was easy to work with. His team was efficient and very pleasant to deal with. I would definitely recommend!

name: Cody Hirsberg
text: We decided to use Homewood Carpet & Flooring based on the referral of a trusted builder. Tyler was excellent to work with regarding sales and selection. He came by the house for measurements and then met us at the showroom to review his recommendations and to make a flooring selection. Foo then organized the install and, because we were in a bind with guests arriving in a few days, was able to install the carpet a day sooner than expected.  Overall, Homewood Carpet and Flooring exceeded expectations which is why they earned this 5-star review.

name: Ann Langley
text: Paul was extremely helpful and responsive throughout our decision making and installation process.   The installation crew was courteous and very hardworking.  Everything was cleaned up and put back in place when they finished.  I have already referred this company to several friends!

name: Alexandra Baugh
text: Got carpet replaced in 3 rooms. Very fast and good quality work! Would definitely use again and recommend. Fair pricing and kind staff.

name: Wendy Morell
text: I’ve had three jobs done in the last month: carpeting stairs, refinishing original hardwood floors, and laying vinyl flooring. All three looked amazing when finished. The people who completed the work were kind and knowledgeable. I would highly HIGHLY recommend to anyone for any job, and if I have any flooring needs in the future, I will definitely be going back to Foo!

name: Austin Wilson
text: Amazing customer service! Fair pricing, they did a great job, and in a timely manner. Will use again!

name: Shannon George
text: I called on Saturday and was told someone would come out Monday to look at our floors. No one showed up, no one called to cancel, no one called to reschedule.

name: Erika Olds
text: Paul was very nice an easy to work with excellent customer service.This company has great pricing and did an excellent job on my mom's floors. They went above and beyond to make sure she was satisfied I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Mandy Willig
text: Paul and his team replaced our carpet with beautiful engineered hardwood flooring. They provided amazing service throughout the process, from home consultation through the final walk through. We will not hesitate to recommend them to our friends and family!

name: Mark Grissom
text: We had an urgent need entering into a new home. Foo and crew responded same day, made selections easy, had it installed before we could get through the quoting process of big box. The installers were friendly, efficient, and the work was superb with exactly the product we wanted. What else can I say! Oh, above all else wife loves the new carpet and quality work.

name: carol harris
text: From the moment I walked in the door I was completely impressed with Homewood Carpet & Flooring. Not only was Paul knowledgeable about the flooring, he was genuinely interested in my specific needs for flooring. He was completely helpful  in the product selection that would best suit my needs. He stayed in communication with me throughout the entire process. His install team was  right on time and did a beautiful job. The guys were extremely thorough. I was really impressed with their attention to detail. They finished my (whole house) flooring job on time and left my home clean and in order. I have no reservations at all in recommending the guys at Homewood Carpet & Flooring to my friends and family.

name: 9 Bachelors
text: Great job all the way. Excellent service, accurate quotes, very professional, polite and thorough installation team.

name: Greg Yemm
text: Quality, prices, and service were all 5 stars. The owner was very responsive any time I had questions too. Definitely would recommend.

name: Kelly Arrington
text: Enthusiastic crew who did a fantastic job on matching the rest of my floors and amazing job on my stairwell. The were timely, efficient and did a high quality job!

name: Brian Murphy
text: You are in good hands with Paul and his team.  First class service and a job well done.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking for flooring work.  Paul’s team sanded and re-stained my floors.  The work was of the highest quality.  Will definitely work with them again in the future.

name: Corie Clark
text: Foo was easy to work with and very responsive. The carpet and vinyl plank in out basement looks great.

name: Bryan Stack
text:
I highly recommend them. Paul helped me select the flooring to replace my carpet. He was very prompt in providing an estimate and getting the job started.
The installers did an excellent job removing the carpeting and installing my vinyl floors. My condo looks 100% better. I will choose them again when I sell my condo and purchase another home.

name: Britney Henry
text: Paul and his staff did a wonderful job with our flooring project! We had our red oak floors refinished and also had our stairs repaired. They took our very outdated and yellowed flooring and transformed it into a beautiful brown/gray color that is exactly what we had envisioned. They even mixed two of the stains to get the exact color we described. One room had several areas of stains that was so bad I wasn’t sure they would ever look normal, but they were able to make the stains completely disappear. They also replaced a broken part of one step and repaired the stair treads so that they no longer squeak! We are completely satisfied with the job that Homewood Carpet and Flooring did for us and we appreciate their professionalism and thoroughness.

name: felicity79
text: I was unsure of what flooring I wanted, Paul was very helpful on helping me decide to refinish my hardwoods or to choose a new floor. He came to my house to show me color swatches and was willing to come back a second time when I thought I had changed my mind. I ended up going to his store and we picked out a beautiful floor that I am so proud of. Installation only took maybe 4 hours for my 900 ft. square floor. I would choose them again for my flooring needs. Will be redoing my kitchen floor soon, and definitely plan on calling Homewood Carpet and Flooring.

name: Susan Copeland
text: I have used Homewood carpet and flooring three separate times now for my home renovations and each time they exceed my expectations. Both Foo and Paul are really lovely to work with and provide clear communication so that I always knew exactly what was going to occur. And with a German Shepard puppy and 3 teenage boys, they have always guided me on the best flooring and carpet that would keep up with our chaotic and busy household :)!

name: Tracy Thomas
text: Paul and the guys at Homewood carpet and flooring did a wonderful job removing and installing new carpet in our upstairs! I even had to reschedule them and they fit me in on a Saturday at a moments notice! Everyone I worked with was professional and timely.

name: Kristina Martin
text: So compassionate and helpful. We had a time crunch and extenuating circumstances and they worked within those and did the job well.

name: Kathryn Dorlon
text: Friendly staff! Always looking to make your experience a good one and find the product you are looking for your home!

name: Klaudia Thomas
text: Paul did a great job providing the best customer service, attention to detail, offered his expertise and knowledge in carpet and wood selection process. Price was very competitive with others in the market. The crew was very professional, efficient and accurate. We love our new floors, looks amazing. We highly recommend this company.

name: marybeth kaylor
text: They did a great job refinishing our hardwoods and installing sisal carpet. Very fair, honest, and professional.  Highly recommend and will use again!

name: Aaron Tallo
text: Excellent and fast service. These guys are top shelf all the way around. If you need flooring you need to call Homewood Flooring!

name: Landon Parris
text: My wife and I need carpet installed in 2 bedrooms and we’re going to do it ourself, until we walked in Homewood Carpet and Flooring and met Paul, who was so helpful in the store helping us pick out the right carpet for our home. He came and took measurements same day and we had a great quote within hours. Paul updated us on ever detail until carpet was here and job was done. Installing team was professional and friendly. Paul came after they finished to do a walk through and checked everything. So blown away by the personable staff, quality products, and thorough service they provided!!!!

name: Renie Moss
text: Paul and his team went above and beyond, beating all the big box store prices and installation timelines.  We had carpet installed in two bedrooms and needed it done prior to an appraisal for refi.  The team was fast and professional. Highly recommend!

name: Debra Marciniak-Grimm
text: We are pleased with the carpet installed by Homewood Carpet and Floor. Paul and his team were professional and easy to work with. He knew we were in a time crunch and were able to squeeze us into his schedule when another customer dropped out.

name: Roena Randall
text: From picking the carpet to installation, Homewood Flooring did an outstanding job. I am in love with my new carpet and  highly recommend them.

name: Mike Simpson
text: Just had our den and home office re-floored, and couldn't be happier with the results. Paul was very responsive to our initial inquiries, and provided good advice in helping us with our decision. Installation was prompt and very well done.

name: Gary cutter
text: Foo and his team were spectacular - responded immediately to my request for an inquiry - called on the morning of the measurement to be sure the time was still good for me.  The team did the job professionally and actually ahead of schedule.  Having spent three weeks trying to get the job done with a big box store with all types of exceptions, it was a pleasure to have the entire process done is less time.  Highly recommend this team.

name: Mary Rogato
text: My bath had to be rebuilt from subfloor because of water damage. Paul’s expertise management  and planning was excellent in getting job complete in a timely manner.  This bath was a total mess. When the workers came in and I saw their work, I knew my bath would look stunning.  Tile work is perfection.  I have been pleased with every job Homewood carpet and flooring has done for me. I strongly recommend to anyone.

name: Ryan Hartfield
text: Foo and Paul do amazing work at a reasonable price. Their customer service surpassed my expectations. I wish I could give them more than 5 stars! ***HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!*** A+++

name: Ryan Hartfield
text: Foo and Paul do not only do great work, but really help to guide you through the process and help you find the best options for your budget.

name: Liza Roitman
text: Great experience!

name: Connie Thompson
text: Stairs look great!!

name: Ken Patel
text:
very nice and great staff.
professsional attitude , on time completed the enire work.

vert much on time show up, quiet work oriented employeres.

the owner/maneger was great

Thanks

Ken P

name: Alyssa Terry
text: I have tried to visit this store multiple times during the posted store hours, but they have been unexpectedly closed each time.

name: James McCrary
text: Very professional and detail oriented!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, James. Best wishes.

name: Matt Trombley
text: I've known the owner, Cory, for several years and I can say with complete honesty that he is a man of integrity, hard work, and resolve. What this would mean to any Footprints customer is that they would benefit from an honest estimate, timeframe for work, and commitment to see it through. I can't think of better traits for someone working on my home, and so I would highly recommend Cory to anyone looking to have a flooring project completed.

resp.text: Hello Matt, thank you for the five-star review of our flooring installation business and your incredibly kind words!

name: Matt Elsner
text: I have been fortunate to work with Cory on a number of projects, and I will go out of my way to continue to work with him when I can.  Honesty and integrity are two traits that you can expect from him.

resp.text: Hello Matt, thank you for the review! We appreciate your kind words.

name: Shelley
text: I cannot say enough great things about Cory and his installation crew. The entire process, from start to finish, was amazing. Everything was thoroughly explained, I was kept up to date, and there were no surprise fees. The installation team far exceeded my expectations. They were very friendly, efficient and highly skilled. They cleaned up everything before they left and made sure I was happy with everything. I had put my kitchen floor project off for a long time because I can't stand having strangers working in my home as it is so stressful. This company put me at ease and I am so grateful I gave them a chance. My new floor is beautiful! If you are hesitant about having strangers in your house and need a great job at a very fair price, call Cory!

resp.text: Shelley, Thanks for the kind words! We are happy to read that our team has been able to provide exceptional service for you. As always, our team is avaible if you need anyhting else. Best wishes.

name: Ken Lyons
text: They have a huge showroom with hundreds of flooring styles and samples.  The customer service from selecting your flooring through installation process is top notch.  I enjoyed my experience with Town & County Flooring in Troy, Al

name: Latoya Smith
text: I highly recommend Town and Country Flooring in Troy, AL. They were very friendly and prompt. It's very rare these days that you get great customer service and awesome service! The contractors Mike and Sharon, along with their crew did a fantastic job! I love my flooring!!

name: Robert Smith
text: You couldn't find a more pleasant and knowledgable company to deal with; don't be fooled by the size of the store.

name: Brenda Colvin-Cheathem
text: Very helpful

name: Leon Vickers
text: Purchased vinyl they didn’t show up until too late to install. Had to call several times to have rescheduled. Finally showed up to install. Installed flooring over AC vent. Still waiting on a call as to when they CAN GET BACK OUT. Weeks now!!!!! Kitchen looks like a huge air pillow!! Terrible customer service. Terrible!!!

name: Victoria Hermann
text: Rock Bottom Carpets was great to work with everyone was friendly. Prices were great and we're happy with how our floors turned out. They were able to install our floors quickly for a fair price. Would recommend.

name: anquiette100
text: Don't use Rock Bottom!!! Never seen such poor quality carpet install.  Carpet wrinkled/buckled in every room they installed it.  looks horrible!

name: Charlotte Ragland
text: THEY'RE THE BEST......I USE THEM ALL THE TIME I LOVE THEM THEY'RE ALWAYS THE ONE FOR ME ALWAYS.......WAY TO GO ROCK BOTTOM KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK 🌝

name: Blake Butler
text: Everything was fine until it was time to do the work.  We wanted vinyl flooring removed and replaced and communicated from the beginning that there were several layers to be removed.  Andy said no problem and we ordered the vinyl and waited a week for the measuring.  After measure they said it would be a little more expensive, which isn't unreasonable.  However, a week later when the crew came to install, they flat out refused to do the work due to possible damage to the sub-floor.  They had a solution to sub-floor damage, but would not do it.  They only offered to put the vinyl down on top of the 4-5 other layers and cut the bottom of the doors.  So now I've wasted 2 weeks when I could've found somebody else to do it.  Extremely frustrated by the lack of communication between sales, measuring crew, and demo/install crews.  Now I own some useless vinyl after they refused to refund me.

name: Tyron Newton
text: I love my new luxury vinyl plank flooring.

name: Mike Dominick
text: Decent price quick install

name: Angela Schram
text: Not a good place to get carpets. We bought flooring for our house a year ago and I’ve called and left messages several times but the manager will not return my calls to even hear my concerns and get a resolution. Our carpet is pulling everywhere and we’re not happy. Obviously they’re not interested in customer service since they can’t even return a phone call. That’s just bad business. I would not recommend or use them again. There’s plenty of other places around Huntsville that I’m sure would treat their customers better.

name: A new life
text: I'm not sure how they stay in business. I'm a small business owner myself. We were to have carpet installed Saturday the 20th when my husband was off work, they did not show up, even after many calls we were told they were still coming. Fast forward to 5:30pm I got home from work and no carpet. I left a message for them to call and let me know what was up. I worked Monday also but have access to my phone, no call. I called on one of my breaks, apparently they don't check their messages because nobody knew anything. I work my small business and a second job, so I work 7 days a week. They told me they could be here Tuesday the 23rd and have the carpet installed by 12 pm so I could be able to keep my appointments in my office in the afternoon as I was off the morning at my second job. That didn't happen. The 2 that came to install didn't have all the materials needed for installation. So they left to get it at 11am and didn't return until 1pm. The job was finished at 2:20pm and I am out $250 for the appointments I had to cancel. And no consideration for my time. I don't recommend using Rock Bottom unless you are at rock bottom.

name: Bryan Minchew
text: Do not do business with them. Check the Better Business Bureau first. Look at Face Book. I don't see how their still in business.

resp.text: My. Minchew is a disgruntled carpet installer who is no longer working for Rock Bottom Carpets. We wish him well at his next place of employment.

name: Tyson DeAngelis
text: Good prices. Quick service. Quality install

name: Jody Thomas
text:
Edit: they sent a very experienced gentleman out to fix the issues. He removed a
Tool from under the carpet and knocked the tack strips down much better than I could (they first told me to do it) there is something else under the carpet on the steps. But I guess we will have to live with it. Raising my score some after they sent a good person out for fix.

TICKED OFF! THEY WON'T RESPOND OVER AN ISSUE OF SAFETY

SHARP TACKS EVERYWHERE!
My 5 year old son can't even play without getting hurt! I'm so mad they don't even want to say anything to me out of the way. It's personal now after my son is bleeding!

STILL PICKING UP CIGARETTE BUTTS AND WHOLE CIGARETTES DROPPED. I even asked them to picked them up before leaving. We cant even walk through our house barefooted. They left tools and other objects UNDER THE CARPET. Carpet is coming up in areas.

resp.text: The issue of tack strip is common. There is tack strip around every wall and at every doorway. This is easily resolved be taking a mallet and knocking the strip down where you step.

name: Terri French
text:
I wouldn't use them again.  They came and installed and left a bit of a mess.  Then when I vacuumed for the first time, my vacuum caught a "nub" they had not trimmed and the carpet ran.  They came and put a new piece in which was darker than the original carpeting.  Also, I noticed a dark spot after they left, it felt stiff like glue.  I called and they were supposed to send someone out to look at it but never did.

Ok, the mgr called and came out today.  They are going to try to remedy the situation.  So, that does give them major points and if they do a good job, I would certainly reconsider using them again.  Good customer service goes a long way in my book.

They came out today (a mere week after the mgr called and came out) and relayed the hallway, without piecing it this time. Everything looks good, like it should have the first time.  But, I am pleased and would recommend them.

name: A G
text: AWESOME!!! If it isn't right they will make it right! LOVE MY NEW FLOORS!! Thank you Rock Bottom Carpets!! Installers Todd and Clay were the bomb!  Big thank you to the manager Mr. Mark!!!  Thank you thank you thank you!!! Would definitely recommend RBC off Bob Wallace!

name: Marlyse Knezevich
text: Poor customer service.  Was told by sales guy that my husband and I couldn't install the flooring ourselves. Because it was too complicated.  WTH? Shouldn't that be our decision if we pay for the flooring? But he wouldn't give us a price/without installation.

resp.text: We also think it would be poor customer service if we did not warn people that the product they were looking at was not a DIY product no matter how good of a handyman her husband thinks he is

name: Amelia Hreha
text: I would absolutely use them again. I went in on a Thursday just before closing and our installation was completed the following Tuesday. I had gotten a quote from Lowe's and Home Depot and both were at least 2-4 weeks out and about $400 more expensive for lower quality products. I got a great deal from Rock Bottom Carpets on a quality carpet and with the money I saved was able to afford the best padding offered. Mark and Raj were such a pleasure to work with. They didn't pressure me to purchase anything and answered all my questions about the products. Raj helped me find the best carpet to fit our budget and needs and Mark was quick to respond to any questions or concerns that we had. I'm not sure why anyone would choose to not support their local businesses especially when they provide better products and services.

name: Priscilla's African Apparel
text: Great staff

name: Kandy Winsette
text:
Installer left a hugh seam visual. Left a mess.
When installer drop carpet on the floor upstairs it caused sheet rock damage to my dining room on first floor under the bedroom. Took pics to RBC they had us email pics so they could turn them in to someone that handles this. He called today and said someone can come back out to fix seam which he agreed was bad. But said his insurance would not cover other damage the installer caused. I wish I could attach my pics so the public could see for yourselves. Would not recommend them to no one.

name: Brandie Dorsett
text: The initial customer service was good. But the follow up was not.

name: William Gallo
text: I was skeptical at first based on the BBB comments and reviews I saw. We decided to still try it out based on the competitive pricing and the installation timeframe. They did an amazing job. We carpeted two bedrooms and put wood laminate in the office and the guys who installed them were amazingly good. They were clean, well experienced guys. Paul kelley was the installation guy accompanied by klein. I would recommend rock bottom carpets to anyone if they keep using pro guys like the two who did our stuff.

name: Sonya Mertz
text: Great customer service

name: Rachel Kepler
text: I will never use them again. Not only did they knowingly send a sick man to my house (he vomited RIGHT IN MY FRONT FLOWER BED!) My husband had to help move the carpet in and out of the house and move the furniture, which I was told moving furniture was only a courtesy and that was after the fact fyi and they left a mess of left over carpet in my bathroom and the tub?!?!. The manager told us, "well the job he did was good,right?" BUT YOU SENT A SICK MAN TO MY HOUSE,ALONE. We got nothing,a run around apology was pretty much it and an offer for a discount on future need, UMMMMM,NO. I will never use them again,my husband did half the work and,the installer(sub contractor) was very nice,yet he was sent to do a job even though he was sick and the manager was rude. So,next time,I will go with a company that has empathy for the people they work with and for.

name: Mark Bounds
text: Inexpensive flooring store

name: Mark Mcdaniel
text: They were very patient with me in scheduling the work. The prices are reasonable. We are enjoying our new carpet and vinyl.

name: Diana Hall Bixby
text: EXTREMELY helpful and great customer service.  The crew was very nice and made sure everything was cleaned up. I highly recommend Ben Baker Flooring. Clark Always takes care of me. Thanks guys!!

name: Kelli Wallace
text: I had flooring installed from this company in 2015. Upon completion there were gaps in the flooring, my moldings were not put back, I requested they build my floors up to be an even transition between the tiles and wood flooring which they did not, the columns in my house were not accounted for when they did their measurements and the transitions between the floors were not properly laid so they continuously shifted and came loose. After two years of fighting to get these things fixed, it was finally somewhat decent. But the gaps between the flooring became an issue and soon started to separate and pull up. They came out and looked at the flooring in 2018 and agreed to lay new flooring for me, I picked out my new flooring bc the design I had previously ordered was no longer available. Apparently the new floor I picked was back ordered so it took months to come in, and once it did I was not notified, so I had to call and call to get my installation set up. Needless to say, there were more issues and as of right now, I still do not have the transition from my kitchen into my dining room bc the installer said that someone else would be handling that and when I called that person they laughed and said that was incorrect and now noone will answer my calls.

name: Willie Stanford
text: The staff is very helpful and friendly even they're give you suggestion if it is a do it yourself project

name: Tommy Davenport
text: Professional flooring

name: Karen Gardner
text: Professional, informative  and reliable!

name: Karen Rae Gardner
text: Great installation

name: Tom Mclemore
text:
I have used Ray on three homes and he is absolutely the best. Not sure what a parking lot issue has to do with a business's quality of workmanship.
The prices are fair, service is great and their selection is huge.

name: Trisha Smith

name: ray langston
text: I am the owner of this place and would like to explain the bad reviews. These were truck drivers that were tresspassing and got their feelings hurt and left bad reviews. Neither of the 3 have ever stepped foot inside my store

name: kyle
text:
If you support truckers (the back bone of America, the ones that bring you food and all the essentials you need) do not shop here. They will boot you and say you owe them 500 bucks to remove it. They say they have signs up to warn truckers to not park or turn around in their lot but the sign is 100 feet off the road and against the building, you can't see that till you are already in the lot. The other 4 signs they have are 1"×2" signs you can't read till you are right on top of them and from what I could see those only said no parking. If you really wanted to till truckers not to use your lot you should put your sign front and center next to the roadway where people can see it.

They clearly can't make enough money on flooring so they have to prey on truck driver to make their mortgage. This place is a cash grab, and a place of extortion.

resp.text: Again sir I have had nothing but problems from disrespectful truckers since I opened my business. If you can’t read a 4 foot by 8 foot sign asking you to not park or turn around there then maybe you are in the wrong line of work. Maybe an optometrist visit is in your future.

name: Charles Wright
text: It's a sad company that preys on unsuspecting truck drivers.

resp.text: If this truck driver could learn to read and had a little respect for others property then this truck driver would have not had any problems. There are 5 signs telling truck drivers they cant trespass on this property yet some think laws and rules do not apply to them. When a driver knowingly tresspasses is he really unsuspecting?

name: Nick Kcin
text: No good, would not recommend. I was sold on the panel flooring we have being pulled up to repair the areas were gaps were located, this wasn't done. All the crew did was squirt glue into the gaps and jam them forward to join them. This resulted in not all the gaps being fixed, and the ones glued a few of them have mounds of dried glue sticking out.  The flooring that was placed was fine, but the 1/4 round wasn't painted/stained on the cut ends, the transitions were nailed in (which is fine) leaving  sharp nail heads sticking up which would easily cut a foot. I guess this job would have been ok if it was cheap but it was not.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear this. We know that our team went out and tried to fix your older flooring but put in new flooring that you loved. Please give us a call and we can help you out, thanks!

name: Beth Eddings
text: I cannot share enough good things about our experiences with Hill's. The quality of their work is wonderful and they stand behind it. We purchased some beautiful tile from them in 2016 transforming our kitchen and bath, and then in 2018 returned to purchase all new bedroom carpet before our daughter was born. Each time we've been presented with affordable options that are still of high quality and any time someone we know is looking for flooring I recommend Hill's in Hueytown. They offer all the same products as flooring places in Birmingham but at a fraction of the price due to being a small family shop.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your lovely review, Beth! Come see us anytime and we're so pleased you're happy!

text: I highly recommend Hill's Carpet and Floor Coverings. The technicians arrived exactly when they told me they would, were experienced and efficient in their work and finished flooring my entire house in 2 days. They were neat and courteous as they worked. My floor looks beautiful and the price was reasonable. If you need flooring work in Hueytown, Hill's is the company to call.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mrs.Kleist! Come back and see us anytime!

text: I've been using Mr. Hill since the early '90's. Prices are always reasonable, products are great, & installs always go well. I would highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

name: Diane C
text: I had a terrible experience and would not recommend or use them again. A 1 day installation turned into 5 visits to my home, they have not corrected everything they messed up, and they destroyed all the door frames. They tell you they've have been in business for a long time, but the owners are not the same, and neither is the quality of work.

resp.text: We have been patient in our reply and have decided it is time to respond since you will not take our repeated calls. We understand your frustration with the initial installation of your flooring which resulted in our decision to terminate the original contractor. Obviously we were frustrated as well and we spoke with you at length over the phone about this. The errors he made have been corrected.  You called again with concern that the carpet was not fastened correctly in one area and, though after inspecting we determined there wasn't a problem, we still agreed to have a contractor come and re-stretch it in an effort to resolve your concern.  We disagree that "they destroyed all the door frames".  Yes, there was some slight damage done to some of the door frames but they were far from being "destroyed".  Your salesman offered to repaint those areas himself but you declined.  We have gone as far as discounting your invoice three times in an effort to appease you.  We have a two year labor warranty and we stand behind it.  The quality of work performed by subsequent contractors to correct the errors of the first was excellent.  Hill's Carpet & Floor Coverings has been in business at our main location since 1986.  The original owner sold the business to his nephew some 9 years ago and the original owner remains active in the business.  We are proud of our history of serving the greater Birmingham area by offering quality products, competitive prices, and professional installation.  We're proud of and humbled by so many positive reviews on line.  We recognize that the original installation fell short of the last standard and we have tried diligently to work with you to resolve your remaining issue.

name: Kelly Finnegan
text: We chose to go with Hill’s over a box store like Home Depot or Lowes and we are so glad we did. They were so incredibly helpful throughout the whole process. They let us take home several samples until we found the right one. They explained the different types of carpets and the benefits of each one. Mr Hill personally came out and measured and quoted the room. Installers were right on time and worked quickly and did such a wonderful job. We love our carpet and plan to use Hill’s in the future when we redo our kitchen flooring.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for your honest review! We really do take pride in doing our best to bring beauty to your home without the hassle. Remember us and come back to see us anytime! Thanks again!!

name: Maria Holmes
text:
FYI LONG REVIEW: I originally contacted Hill's back in Aug to refinish our hardwood floors. Very pleasant experience with Clark with setting up my consultation. Cullen came out and did the consultation with me and my husband. It went well, and the price was very reasonable. He advised me that he would email me the proposal and to call him when we were ready.

I waited for the email but never received it. However, I still called a week later and let him know we were ready to schedule but that I still haven't received the proposal email. I didn't feel comfortable calling to pay my deposit over the phone without a proposal. He wasn't at the office when I called but was going to call once he got settled. When he finally called, I wasn't available but I still didn't get a proposal email.

So I waited before calling back. Then Clark called and left a msg asking if my consultation went well and if I was ready to schedule. At that time I was not because I wanted the proposal on paper with the amount I was quoted. Never heard back.

So I called again Monday, 10/12 and spoke with a gentleman about scheduling (yes I was still willing to use this company because the price I was quoted was the best). He got my name and address and tried to look up an invoice or proposal and guess what, there was none!! He asked who did my consultation and I told him Cullen. He said he would get him to call me. Days later, I'm still waiting on my call.

The other 2 companies I've contacted this week have been very responsive and gotten me proposals within the same day of the consultation. I'd rather pay the extra $ for great customer service and communication.

resp.text: Ms. Holmes, your experience with our company is very regrettable.  We strive to establish a meaningful relationship with all our customers resulting in a satisfying experience throughout the purchasing process.  It is unfortunate that in your case we failed to do that and we apologize.  Having been in business in the greater Birmingham area since 1987 we're very humbled and gratified by the excellent rankings we have on social media on Facebook, Google, and the Better Business Bureau.  We appreciate your candidness and again, apologize for not exceeding your expectations.  Your review is a reminder of the importance of delivering a satisfying experience for each and every potential customer every day.

text:
Please do yourself and choose wisely before using Hill's, I used the Helena store and can not and would not use or recommend any Hill's seeing how they all the same owner and installers.
I will tell you about my experience, The carpet is nice and seems to be installed well, this is not where the problem is and if you enjoy paying someone to rub paint off your walls and base boards then tell you" well that just happens" then you have found your place. My wife and I spent over an hour sweeping dusting and vacuuming after the installers left angry and in a hurry, when i told them I expected them to vacuum and clean what mess they made during the install, just got in the van and left?!
I will tell you the salesman did at least get me a whole pint of paint so I could repaint what HILL'S CARPET should have taken care of, there wasn't even an offer to say "hey how bout we at least knock of $20.00 or $25.00 for your time and trouble." Granted by what it would have taken to make this right it isn't a major deal, but do you really want to spend your hard earned money and have to clean up and paint a house you just cleaned and painted? Then be disrespected and talked down to in your own home? Please make a better choice than I did. There are many carpet stores in the area and I know most will appreciate your business,
I can tell you for a fact unforunately that HILL'S CARPET will not.

text: My husband and I are very please with the whole experience from buying our flooring to the two gentleman who put it in. They did a fantastic job. We LOVE our new floor. We recommend American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite and will use again in the future.

name: Steven Duquette
text: I had a great experience at AFC&G from the minute I walked through the door until the minute the job was completed.  Don and Jennifer were so helpful throughout the entire process and what a selection of materials they have in the storeroom to choose from.  My granite counter tops and custom designed shower turned out like a showroom display.  Many thanks to Roland who did the design and installation.  Every measurement and cut he made was with laser precision.  I highly recommend you visit the showroom to see what they carry and talk with their very knowledgeable sales reps.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Duquette! We loved the finished product and are glad to have you as a loyal customer! If you need anything at all, you know who to call.

name: jay trammell
text: Stay away from this place. Salesman that helped me was great. Owner is crazy to work with I was giving quote and come in to store and he changed it. Very low to do. Obviously does not care about business . This 5k plus Job was going to be a 12k plus job when done so business is not his priority. Other stores did honor their quotes.  Check your options as they lost me and a lot more business because of this guy. Pathetic customer relations .

name: Forest Dixon`
text: American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite is the best place to go if you're interested in perusing some remodeling a home. We just had some new carpet installed in our house and couldn't be more pleased with the outcome! Mr. Don Williams is personable, yet professional. He gave us a fair up-front price as soon as we gave him our measurements. Ms. Jessica also helped us and she was a pleasure to work with as well. Even the installers were professional, quick and did a wonderful job. We are planning on remodeling our bathrooms with new cabinets, granite counter-tops and porcelain tile, so we know exactly where to go for our next project!

resp.text: Thank you, Forest! We appreciate your business!

name: Maggie Ainsworth
text: American Carpet did an AMAZING job on my new vinyl flooring!!! Workers were professional, punctual, and friendly. I would highly recommend them to anyone interested in new floors. Will definitely use them again!!!!

name: Mike Doggett
text: Great Selection!! This store has a TON of products. Jennifer was our salesperson and guided us every step of the way. We looked at engineered wood and solid wood flooring, but ended up getting a beautiful tile that looks exactly like a wood floor. Guests are shocked when they find out it's tile. We also got a backsplash and granite for our bar and it looks amazing. We will be going back when we get ready for cabinets.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking upgrade their home. They had a amazing selection of vinyl plank and vinyl tile that would be perfect for a bigger family on a budget.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike! Great doing business with you!

name: HM M
text: I walked in and was not greeted. I walked up to two people at desks and they didn't seem interested and couldn't seem to help even though I had a tile in my hand. They called another guy. I asked him about finding a similar size to my vintage tile because Lowe's only had 4x4. He said it would have to be measured and hesitated. He said he would see if he could find a tape measure. He came back and measured and said 4.25x4.25 and that was custom. He said I would have to buy a box but wasn't positive he knew how many tiles that was. He did a bunch of stuff on a calculator until he quoted me 100 tiles for $62. I needed 14 so I told him I would check back after searching. He told me he had the same problem when he did his bathroom. He said okay and maybe I would find an open box somewhere. I walked into Home Depot and 4.25x4.25 is a standard size. I bought 14 tiles for $2.46. I'm not sure what to say about that. I will let you come up with your own conclusions.

name: Lynn Sigouin
text:
Thank you once again for another beautiful and professional installation. Our stairs look like the center piece of our new home thanks to our wonderful Irene who gave us great customer service and always followed up with calls, Jonathon and Stephen who installed with perfection for detail and so,so polite and so talented.
And for the kind, sweet voice on the other end greeting me this morning,  Jessica who assisted all my needs.
Great team you have, Don...Jay, I am sorry to have missed you my friend but we couldn't be more pleased .
Blessings to all,
Thank you again,
Ray and Lynn Sigouin (Principe)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lynn!! We are so thankful for your business. Please let us know if you need anything else in the future!

name: Belinda Hall
text: I came to this store for cabinets.  It is going on 2 months. The are not hung. The parts of the cabinets they just ordered without ever coming to my home for any type of measurements are under my carport blocking so I can't park my car. I have called repeatedly,  people have been rude, hung up on, talked down, and still no progress!!

name: Nina Propst
text: We are very satisfied with our new carpet and with the service we received.  We recommend checking them out for all of your flooring and countertops first...it will save you lots of time and stress!  Special thanks to Don Williams.  We will be back.

name: Mendy Nilsson
text: Shannon Williams is fantastic. He listened to my needs and showed me lots of options giving the pros and cons of each type of floor. That allowed me to choose the best floor for my needs and WOW I'm so thrilled with my luxury vinyl plank flooring. So beautiful and so easy to clean it makes cleaning house fun. Thank you Shannon and American!!

name: LeBarbara Stinson
text: I had the opportunity to have my Luxury Vinyl Plank floors installed by Mr. Glenn Smith. He had his team members with him. They were the kindest men. They worked hard and didn't half step on anything! They are funny and welcoming. I would recommend them anytime. I thoroughly enjoyed them. They were professional and operated on total and complete excellence!

resp.text: Thank you, LeBarbara!! We will let Glenn know he did a great job. We appreciate your business!

name: Susan Allen
text:
Very informative, professional, and helpful!

Thanks Don Williams.

name: Lisa McGhee
text: I want to say that I won a contest with American Carpets. My prize was 250$ off any area rug in the show room. I went in yesterday to pick out my rug, and was greeted by the owner Mr. Don.. I never expected to have the experience I had with the owner and or any of the showroom employee's they were all so nice and helpful. The owner was there to help me the whole time and made it very memorable he is a very great guy.. I would never hesitate about sending someone in to get any flooring these people treated me with the up most respect and dignity as if I was a paying customer and I'll never forget that... Thanks again to all the people at American Carpets.. y'all are the best... Thanks again Mr. Don glad to have met you...

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! It was our pleasure!

name: Mr. Curtis
text:
In the past I've remodeled homes for a living, but was never in the position to actually come out of pocket and select carpets, etc.
It turns out making the right choice is lots harder than you think! With the fierce competition now days, it's easy to be told what you want to hear, given prices that you can't judge properly, and ultimately, run around in circles ending with products that are NOT to your satisfaction.
These issues do not arise with American Flooring (the Mobile location is the one I've become acquainted with). The woman who answered my calls, Jessica, was absolutely wonderful to speak with, and the sales person she brought me to the table with, Shane, was both professional, and compassionate.
Suffice it to say I will be returning very soon!

resp.text: Thanks you, Mr. Curtis!! We look forward to hearing from you soon, and in the meantime if you have any questions at all, you know who to call!

name: t h
text: I have recently completed a kitchen renovation and love the outcome. Don helped me select the perfect quartzite countertop for the new island, we purchased luxury vinyl plank for the new floors plus found a beautiful new rug too. Thank you so much for all of your assistance! I am pleased and feel I got a great deal and great service at American Flooring. I would highly recommend them to all of my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you!! We loved the way your kitchen turned out. Looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: candes ritter
text: I’ve had several rooms carpeted and have always received excellent service, prices and installments.  Absolutely...... this is your first stop if you need flooring!

resp.text: Thank you, Candes! We really appreciate your business!

name: Gary Stiegler
text: My wife came in with a sample and the info for the flooring which had been purchased at AC.  Johnny,  the salesman immediately let her know without looking around that they didn't carry the item.  She proceeded to look around the store on her own, no one asking if she needed help, but after 20 minutes, found the exact piece of flooring!  Found Johnny, and he gave her a price of almost $200 for a 12 piece box of vinyl flooring.  Thanks, but NO THANKS American Carpets!

name: Sally Faucheaux
text: Thank you Jennifer ..... She  was my floor and cabinet specialist..... And thank you for all your expertise,   Also want to thank every one else at  American flooring this is not  the. first time that they have done work for me.  I was very pleased in the past,   It has been some years ago I am changing now because I don't want carpet anymore I want to change to ceramic....great job then, and I am sure they will do a awesome job this time as well, after all   I came back for more ;)

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: Jennifer Vaughan is amazing to work with.   She saw my vision and brought it to life.  She also prepared me for the installation experience by explaining it honestly and in depth.   I will never use anyone else in the future except her.   American Flooring needs to hold on to her.

name: Sharon Thompson
text: I am a mortgage lender in the Mobile and Baldwin county areas and have referred more clients than I can count to the Mobile and Gulf Shores locations over the years. Whatever your home needs may be, American Flooring is well rounded with an amazing selection of products, and a wonderful team of sales reps and installers. Be sure you follow them on Facebook, they do lots of giveaways and sales you don't want to miss! If you want to call before you go in and actually schedule ahead, ask for Jessica and she'll make sure someone is there to greet you and meet whatever needs you have!

name: Jessica Bates
text: I'm only giving one star because the material itself was great. The guy that did our template for our countertops measured wrong and only half of my notch was able to be done. The installers flooded my bathroom because the water wasn't off when they took the pipes apart. They knocked several holes in my walls and left without mentioning any of them. After a SIX HOUR install, I still had no water to my sinks and only half of the kitchen done. My stuff wet and laying everywhere and holes in walls in every room they worked in.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to let us know about the situation. We are reaching out to the installation crew and will make this right for you, whatever it may take. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Update: Thank you for allowing us to fix all of the issues. We appreciate your business!!

name: Leslile Reddick
text: I used American Carpets to install my granite, carpet and laminate flooring in my kitchen.  This was done in August 2013.  My carpet separated between rooms and along the kitchen and living room and nails are sticking up.  My under counter sink is loose.  I have been trying to have this fixed for months now with no resolution at all.  Chris in installation has been out to my house twice to "look" at it with promises of it being fixed.  Nothing has been done.  I feel that the work that was done was unprofessional and cheap.  I spent a lot of money on this and would expect it to last longer than a year and if not, at least for it to be fixed in a timely manner.  I will never refer anybody to American Carpets as my experience has been very dissatisfying.  I have never written a review before, much less a negative one, but I felt I had to because I have been getting the run around for months.

name: Steve Baker
text: Very friendly folks. Not only did I get a great job on my ceramic flooring​, I think that this business has a lot of Christian people and that is why it is doing so good. Chris and his son that laid my flooring did a great job. Shane the salesman also knows his job. A plus to this business.

name: Lacy Hilliard
text: Craig Crawford and his crew did excellent on the installation of vinyl flooring. They were personable, well mannered and addressed my concerns immediately . This is the crew you need for your installation! Showroom time was quick and precise with my needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Lacy! We've let Craig know how great of a job he did. We look forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Kem Hall
text: I googled wood floorings and came up with this store. For years I thought they only sold carpet.  I found a vast amount of everything needed for a home; granite, cabinets, wood flooring, tile, rugs, vinyl plank, you name it and its here.  This is a ONE STOP SHOP. Employees are welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable to help with everything. They have good deals too.

name: Kyla Gaston
text: I GOT THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK WITH JENNIFER V. AND JAN R.  - OH MY GOODNESS THEY ARE A TERRIFIC TEAM. I HAD AN ISSUE WITH MY FLOOR WHEN MY HOME WAS BUILT DUE TO THE WRONG DOOR BEING PLACED IN THE HOME, MY WOOD FLOORING HAD TO COME UP DUE TO WATER DAMAGE AND I HAD TO REPLACE IT WITH ANOTHER PRODUCT. JENNIFER AND JAN SAW HOW UPSET I WAS AND WAS ABLE TO MAKE FEEL BETTER AND REASSURED ME THE SECTION OF MY FLOOR WOULD LOOK FABULOUS. I AM SO HAPPY WITH THE TILE AND MOSIAC ACCENT TILE FOR THE FLOOR AREA, IT LOOKS LIKE THE HOME WAS ORGINALLY BUILT THAT WAY. I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH FOR JENNIFER AND JAN TWO WONDERFUL LADIES AND THEY ARE GREAT AT THEIR JOBS.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, Kyla!!

name: Ethel Moore
text: My husband and I received a warm welcome upon entering the storefront and we were treated wonderfully! I explained to Shannon,  our sales rep,  what I wanted and he took us right to it!  It felt as if we were old friends.  I was never pressured to purchase anything which is a PLUS.  I cannot count the many times that I left a place due to the pressure to buy something that I'm really not looking for.  We also met the 'big man in charge' -as I affectionately refer to him.  You know,  the 'open 8 to 8 so don't be late' gentleman.  Lol.  Very warm and professional.  The carpet they installed looks AMAZING!  It's exactly what I wanted at the price I wanted! I will DEFINITELY recommend American Flooring and Cabinets. Ask for Shannon,  HE IS A GEM!

name: Lynn Zimmerman
text: We had Johnny also five years ago and are sorry we went there. We asked for the best pad that they had and also wanted quality carpet and were told that we had ordered it. Now we have "humps" in our carpet from stretching and we have to replace it soon. They tiled our foyer, hall and kitchen and while we love the tile they are uneven and chipped. Afterwards they fixed some but in order to make it right they would have had to redo most of it.  For $6,000+ we just expected better.  Make sure that you know what you are getting is right and the quality that you expect. We went to the Mobile store to have our work done.

name: AllDone3
text:
Not only did they sell me on buying material from them instead of the competitors in the are, they educated me on WHY was more durable or waterproof than another and explained the difference in the products that I was interested in.

"People buy from people, not companies."

These people took fantastic care of me and my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Aldon! We look forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Katie Azevedo
text: We love our new carpet! The prices were reasonable and everything was done quickly and professionally.

name: Mallory Howard
text: So, my impression was great when I left the store but quickly changed. Salesmen were very helpful. Acted eager to help us get our remodel done. They showed me a countertop that they had in stock. It was ok, but not exactly when I was looking for but they insisted it looked great. I again, said no, I’ll keep looking. Kept looking and found the one, the countertop that would look the best. Left the store with the salesman’s card to call back with measurements. My husband called them 2 hours later to get a quote. Salesman tried selling him the countertop they had in stock but was not what I looking for. My husband told him no, she wants the other. He quoted him a price. Then called back and DOUBLED the the first quote because they’d have to order it. Seems they were eager to help sell what they had in stock, but be darned to sell what they’d have to order. We won’t be making a purchase from this store. Our business will go else where.

name: Scotti Bee
text: Great place. Everyone I worked with was fantastic. Great attitudes, wonderful customer service.

name: Apple Henderson
text: Well..well well, what can I say??  I sought help and met a man named Johnny at American.  We were needing granite and flooring.  He showed us a couple of choices and suggested we go to the warehouse in Loxley to pick granite and took our info and said  let him know what we decide on and we'll get a quote.  Needless to say he lost our info and forgot who we were.  We contacted him and reminded him of the quote.  He was to get with us on several occasions and did not!!  The lady who answered my call was aware of my frustration and got a owner/manager to take my call.  Got another we'll get you the answer and call you spill again.  We are not from here and should have believed reviews...SOOOO grateful to have been referred to HARD ROCK GRANITE....they are professional, personable,  thorough, quick and they treat you like family. If quality everything choose HARD ROCK they will be honest and get you a better deal too!!!!!

resp.text:
April,

I am so sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience. We really appreciate your feedback, and hope that in the future you give us the chance to make it right.

name: Logan Crouch
text:
I came in with a friend and Johnny Marino was our salesmen. I have never had a worse experience. He was introduced to us as 'the man who knew it best' and that he had 'been in the business for 43 years'. However, he was not polite, seemed to talk over us as we explained our needs, treated us as if we had no idea what we wanted, and overall was completely unprofessional: not only to us, but for other customers who were in the store. We were shown one product, and after the purchase, were shown a completely different colored product; then were argued to repeatedly that it was the light causing the color difference.

The business had a wide selection of products, and I'm sure with another salesman we would have had a better experience. But this particular transaction just left a bad taste in my mouth.

name: Joshua Carper
text: Dont shop here they are crooks!

name: Victoria Wilson
text: Advertised "Open 8 to 8". Arrived about 5:40 unaware of new store hours. Came to buy flooring for 3 rooms. Salesman took me to the back to look at sheet vinyl rolls and remnants. Told me to browse while he figured out how much I needed from the measurements that I provided. I thought he was taking a little too long. Went to look for him and discovered that everyone had left and locked the doors. That's when I saw a sheet of white paper on the front door with new store hours 8-6. I HAD A PANIC ATTACK! Called my sister. She called Mobile Police Dept. MPD came. A woman in another vehicle then arrived and told him how to get me out. I left a note on the salesman's desk with my name and phone number and what had happened. I picked up my floor plan and measurements and left. NO ONE EVEN CALLED TO APOLOGIZE.

name: Michael A
text: Service was excellent. Shane Gros was very helpful. Definitely the place to shop. Can't go wrong. Thank you Shane for all your help!

name: Todd Burley
text: Visited this place on April 2nd to shop for new carpeting for our new house in Semmes. After we shopped around at several stores we found this place the most useful because of their helpful staff, affordable prices and financing. We ended up buying 1500 sq ft of carpet and had it installed last week, my wife loves the carpet and I love being able to get out of bed barefoot. We are very happy with American Flooring and would recommend them to anyone who needs a good deal on carpet

name: Cyndi Booth
text: I love, love, love my new kitchen granite countertops. They look great with the new cabinets recently installed by American Flooring, Cabinets , and Granite . I had the tile floors installed in a few rooms about 6 months ago. Everything is coming together and looking beautiful! Next is the bathroom shower and countertops and a bedroom needs hardwood flooring and........American Flooring, Cabinets, & Granite "Your One Stop Shop" for all of your remodeling needs!

name: John rohman
text: They have a beautiful showroom and staff was very helpful it was a great experience no stress,ill be back

resp.text: Thanks, John! We are looking forward to it!

name: Danny Woodard
text: Attended the event they had last week where they said they were giving away prizes. I was told by a young lady there the drawings wouldn't be until late that evening and that I had to buy something to get a ticket. I then decided to buy a bottle of cleaner and was told that wasn't enough value for a ticket into the drawing. Clearly a bait and switch tactic to get people in their expensive store. Buyers Beware!

resp.text: No purchase was necessary to enter the contest or win. In fact, 4 out of 5 of our big prize winners didn't shop with us that day. We did not find this customer in our database of transactions that day. We appreciate all of our customers who came in for our 45th anniversary customer appreciation day event and hope to continue being your one stop shop!

name: Diane james
text: LOVE my new rugs! Will definitely be doing business with y'all in the future!

resp.text: Looking forward to it! Thanks!

name: Norma Beachman
text:
We got everything we asked for .the company is number 5 you
And their employment Ronald STEGMEIER is So Good At his Job
iWould Give Him A 10
He made Sure the Job was done Right And worked untill it was Finished
On A Saturday we would Recommend your Company and  Employee
Ronald STEGMEIER to anyone.
Robert and Norma BEACHMAN

resp.text: Thank you, Norma!! We appreciate your business and I believe you meant Roland? We will let Roland know of his stellar job!

name: val hansen
text: When you place an order for 14 boxes for laminate flooring and get 3 boxes you think maybe it was just 1 mistake.  When you also place an order for ceramic tile for the facing of your fireplace at the same time you ordered the laminate flooring and you get 3/4 of it you start to wonder about this store that's been in business for so long. When you place an order for 3 boxes of ceramic tile for the inside of your fireplace at that very same time and you get 1 box because they FORGOT to order 3 and  you have PAID for it ALL!!!!  I am wondering WTH is THEIR problem!!!!  I took back the 1 box of ceramic tile since I didn't like it,  it didn't match, got a refund, pkd up the 3 boxes of flooring and tried to give me the other 2 boxes of ceramic tile I had gotten a refund on?????  Yes, I know had for me to believe too!!  Finally got all of my flooring. Had to reorder more fireplace facing tiles, pd for it, was told it was ordered as I was in the store and would be in that Friday, it came in the next Tuesday!!!! Found out it was NOT ordered until the day AFTER I ordered it!!!!  BTW, I finally went to LOWES, and got the rest of the ceramic tile I needed for the inside of my fireplace that they had IN STOCK!!  All this going on as my contractor was doing what he could with what we had!!!  Needless to say HE was not very happy and will be writing a review also on this store.  I live 18 miles 1 way from this Mobile store.  I made a trip 6 days in a row.  My sales person was Shane Williams.  I would NEVER recommend this store to anyone and will tell everyone I know of my experience.

name: J H
text: Misleading sales. If they make a mistake you are stuck with it...no returns! I tell everyone not to shop here. Salesman called me "sweetie" when he refused to correct his mistake..how demeaning. Similar incident with an acquaintance of mine, so must not be a rare occurrence.

name: Leigh Stewart
text: Don has always help us in anyway that he can.  If I ever had a problem,  Don take care of it himself. We have been with him for many, many years.

name: Hannah Saenz
text: This is most definitely a one stop shop, bought my counter tops, cabinets and flooring here. The prices were very affordable and I highly recommend this place to everyone!

name: Jonathan Cunningham
text: Good place friendly service

name: Jason Pyon
text: Great people, great floors!

resp.text: Thank you, Jason!

name: jessie james
text: Awesome Customer Service!!!!!!

name: Tiffany Middleton
text: Great customer service

resp.text: Thank you, Tiffany. We appreciate your business!

name: Kyle Patterson
text: Very good experience

resp.text: Thanks, Kyle! Who was your sales rep?

name: Michael Farrier
text: Helpful

resp.text: Thank you, Michael!

name: Victoria Davis
text: New Life Refinishing renovated two bathroom vanities for me. They arrived when they said they would and kept us informed of when they would be returning. They spent hours sanding the vanities down to the wood, inside and out, then applied the base coat and paint in the color I selected. Even though the refinishing of the bases was done on-site, they did not make a mess or create a lot of dust. Doors and drawers were refinished at their shop. The finished vanities are even nicer than I expected. The pictures below show the cabinets before (white) and after (grey) refinishing. I recommend this company to anyone needing cabinets refinished.

resp.text: Thanks so much for sharing your experience!

name: Amanda Arthur
text: Had our front door refinished and it looks great! Highly recommend!

name: Sonja Mathis
text: New Life did an excellent job repairing an antique dresser for me. Thankful to Nick for the great work! So glad to have my Grandmother’s dresser back with me in much better condition. I can’t even tell where the repair was! Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words!

name: Beth Marshall
text: Rather than purchasing new cabinets for our home, we decided to contact New Life Refinishing to have them painted. They came recommended from a friend. I was worried that the cabinets would look "painted" since we were going from a light wood color to grays and blues. I cannot begin to describe how amazing the final product is. Not only is the workmanship exemplary, but the staff is also. They were punctual, easy to work with, an even entertained our high maintenance cat who wanted to be in the center of the work. I would HIGHLY recommend New Life Refinishing!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind review!! We really enjoyed you guys!!!

name: Adam & Avery Tuley
text: We are very impressed with the service provided by New Life Refinishing. They were professional and extremely humble about their expertise. The turn around time was quick and they provide delivery services. Super reasonable price! The quality of the finished table exceeded our expectations. We will forever be grateful to New Life Refinishing for giving our family dining room table a new life!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to share that!

name: Jody Charland
text: All I can say is "WOW" my wife loves this piece now!  She says it looks exactly like she remembered when she went to her grandmas house when she was a little girl.  I only wish I had some before photos to show you.  Nick took it from a failed restoration(heavy varnish), separated joints, broken drawer floor and so many Knicks , dents and scratches to a beautiful desk again.  My wife thanks you Nick and the rest of your crew.  Not gonna lie, I got some KUDOS for finding a great place to do the work!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great feedback!

name: Dianne Debter
text: My door is beautiful!!! A contractor, who had previously been to my house came by. He smiled really big and said, “Your door is brand new! Looks great!” He is right my door looks new! What a fantastic job! I am SO pleased! It all went so well!Nick follows through as planned and does quality work!  👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻😄Thank you Nick!😄

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Sonya Brasher
text: Our door looks absolutely beautiful!  Nick was very professional and polite. I would highly recommend New Life Refinishing for your next project !!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review!

name: Pete Hudson
text: I am thrilled with my "new" kitchen table!  I had the table top of my grandmother's dining table refinished, and it is better than I ever remember it being!  I can't remember what type of finish Nick said he used, but he said it is very durable.  And it is SO SMOOTH!  I just want to pet it every time I walk by.  It is beautiful!  I'm looking forward to making new memories with it now!  Also, I had previously re-caned a few of the chairs and needed them to be stained to match the others, and they look perfectly matched!  Very happy customer here!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review!  The finish is a 2k Polyurethane

name: Ray Toth
text: Great experience with NLR! From my first contact through completion of the refinishing of our front doors, they were outstanding.  Very professional, friendly, and responsive.  I would absolutely recommend them for your refinishing needs.

resp.text: Thanks for your business and the awesome review!

name: Kevin Call
text: Our live edge table turned out beautifully. They did an amazing job!! Highly recommend!! You wont be disappointed!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words and for the opportunity to work on your beautiful table. It is one of our favorite pieces we've worked on!

name: Jake Glombowski
text: Nick refinished an old dining room table for my wife and I. We inherited table from my wife's grandmother, so it had a lot of sentimental value. The table was made with white pine and has a lot of character and curves. However, it is old and had a lot of wear and tear, so it needed a lot of work. We wanted a somewhat dark gray table to go in our new home, but we were nervous that the white pine dining table couldn't be refinished to match what we wanted and we would have to pay for a brand new table. Nick blew us away with what he was able to do to stain and darken the white pine table. It took him a couple weeks to work on it and us viewing the table's progress. It was well worth the wait, and we love our newly refinished dining room table!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Terry Patterson
text: Nick and the rest of the guys did a fantastic job on refinishing our kitchen cabinets.  They were focused on delivering a perfect job and when the initial sanding did not meet their expectations, they re-sanded every cabinet to make it right.  They communicated well during the entire process.  They also  did a great job cleaning up after the job was completed.  I would highly recommend them for any refinishing job.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review and for your business, we really appreciate it!

name: Robert Guzowski
text: Great quality work and craftsmanship.  I would trust them again with a family heirloom.  Great communication during the process, we couldn't have asked for more.  And they pick up and drop off to boot!  You just can't beat that.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words!

name: Grace Johnson
text: Nick and his team are very professional and great to work with and I would highly recommend them. We recently bought our first home and wanted to change the cabinet color.  The kitchen cabinets were stained a cherry-redish color, and we wanted them to be a darker espresso color. New Life Refinishing took our existing cabinets and re-stained them for a fraction of the price you might pay to reface cabinets. Nick and his team did an excellent job, and our 20 year old cabinets look almost brand new. Nick took one of our doors to try sample colors, and when we didn't like the first color, he started over and tried a different color that we liked. They really want to make sure that you are happy with the product. They taped our entire kitchen off and did a great job ensuring there was no mess. I will be using them again when I want to re-stain my bathroom cabinets.

text: I had a wonderful experience with New Life Refinishing! I wanted to change my kitchen from oak to white which can be very tricky to do without looking tacky.  I found his website by doing a google search for refinishing kitchen cabinets.  Nick came over and gave me an estimate right away.  He has a very warm personality and is immediately likeable.  I knew after talking to him about his process and reviewing his photos on his website that I had found the right person to do the job.  He kept me in the loop through the whole thing.  He comes over when he says he will and calls beforehand, he finishes the job when he says he will.  He took my cabinet doors and drawer faces back to his shop and sprayed them there.  He came into my house and sprayed the actual cabinets and surrounds.  The whole process took under a week and I was amazed at how stunning the kitchen cabinets came out.  I can't stop looking at the kitchen without saying WOW!  His attention to detail and the quality and craftsmanship is beyond compare.  I would highly recommend New Life Refinishing to anyone and would ask him to do any future work!!!

text: I don't recall just how we were introduced to Nick, maybe from a newspaper insert. His estimate was very reasonable, so we asked him to perform the work. To say that we were thrilled with the finished product is an extreme understatement. The set looked better than brand new. We then asked him to do a much harder job, refinishing a hard maple dining room pedestal table and four unmatching chairs (in finish and type of wood) in a stain to match a dining room china cabinet. To make matters even worse, one of the leg bases had been chewed on quite vigorously by a new puppy. Once again, Nick's work was unsurpassed and his estimate was right on.
